question: The mother kept the (raw) rice which is to be cooked in the basket.
answer: Ammā pacitabbaṃ taṇḍulaṃ (raw rice) piṭake ṭhapesi.
incorrect1: Amma pacitabbaṃ taṇḍulaṃ (raw rice) piṭake ṭhapesi.
incorrect2: Ammā pacitabbaṃ taṇḍulaṃ (raw rice) piṭake ṭhapese.
incorrect3: Ammā pacitabbam taṇḍulam (raw rice) piṭake ṭhapesi.

question: The mother kept the (raw) rice which is to be cooked in the basket.
answer: Ammā pacanīyaṃ taṇḍulaṃ (raw rice) piṭake ṭhapesi.
incorrect1: Amma pacanīyaṃ taṇḍulaṃ (raw rice) piṭake ṭhapesi.
incorrect2: Ammā pacanīyaṃ taṇḍulaṃ (raw rice) piṭake ṭhapese.
incorrect3: Ammā pacanīyam taṇḍulam (raw rice) piṭake ṭhapesi.

question: I will not eat the rice which should be eaten by the girl.
answer: Dārikāya bhuñjitabbaṃ odanaṃ ahaṃ na bhuñjissāmi.
incorrect1: Dārikāyā bhuñjitabbaṃ odanaṃ ahaṃ na bhuñjissāmi.
incorrect2: Dārikāya bhuñjitabbaṃ odanaṃ ahaṃ na bhuñjissāme.
incorrect3: Dārikāya bhuñjitabbam odanam ahaṃ na bhuñjissāmi.

question: I will not eat the rice which should be eaten by the girl.
answer: Dārikāya bhojanīyaṃ odanaṃ ahaṃ na bhuñjissāmi.
incorrect1: Dārikāyā bhojanīyaṃ odanaṃ ahaṃ na bhuñjissāmi.
incorrect2: Dārikāya bhojanīyaṃ odanaṃ ahaṃ na bhuñjissāme.
incorrect3: Dārikāya bhojanīyam odanam ahaṃ na bhuñjissāmi.

question: You wish to do the work that should be done by the farmer.
answer: Kassakena kātabbaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ tvaṃ icchasi.
incorrect1: Kassakenā kātabbaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ tvaṃ icchasi.
incorrect2: Kassakena kātabbaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ tvaṃ icchase.
incorrect3: Kassakena kātabbam kammam kātuṃ tvaṃ icchasi.

question: You wish to do the work that should be done by the farmer.
answer: Kassakena karaṇīyaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ tvaṃ icchasi.
incorrect1: Kassakenā karaṇīyaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ tvaṃ icchasi.
incorrect2: Kassakena karaṇīyaṃ kammaṃ kātuṃ tvaṃ icchase.
incorrect3: Kassakena karaṇīyam kammam kātuṃ tvaṃ icchasi.

question: ... samaṇā vanditabbā honti
incorrect2: monks are to be searched for...

question: mā mañcasmiṃ ṭhapehi
answer: do not leave on the bed

question: mañjūsāyaṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ
answer: the gold which should be kept in the box
incorrect2: the gold kept by the people
incorrect3: the flowers brought by the girls

question: sappurisā pūjanīye pūjenti
answer: good men honour those worthy of honour
incorrect1: good men do not honour the robber
incorrect2: the dhamma should be learned by the people
incorrect3: flowers are to be sprinkled with water

question: asappurisā tathā (likewise) na karonti
answer: wicked men do not do likewise
incorrect1: truth is not to be searched for
incorrect2: the truth is to be realised
incorrect3: wicked men do not search for truth

question: rakkhitabbaṃ dīpaṃ
answer: the island which should be protected
incorrect1: flowers which are not to be cut
incorrect2: trees which are to be sprinkled with water

question: bhūpālena rakkhitabbaṃ dīpaṃ
answer: the island which should be protected by the king
incorrect1: The trees planted in the park are to be cut.
incorrect2: The islands should be protected by the king.
incorrect3: the truth is to be realised

question: ... amaccā na sammā (well) pālenti
answer: the ministers do not govern well...
incorrect1: lay devotees to not protect well...
incorrect2: good men do not honour well...
incorrect3: the kings to not protect well...

question: manussehi dhammo uggaṇhitabbo
answer: the dhamma should be learned by the people
incorrect1: the dhamma should be learned by the monks
incorrect2: the dhamma should be learned by the kings
incorrect3: the dhamma should be learned by the ministers

question: saccaṃ adhigantabbaṃ hoti
answer: the truth is to be realised
incorrect1: the gold is in the box
incorrect2: the island is to be protected
incorrect3: good men are to honour the truth

question: kumārīhi āhaṭāni pupphāni
answer: the flowers brought by the girls
incorrect1: the flowers left on the bed
incorrect2: the island protected by the king
incorrect3: the flowers left by the girls

question: ... udakena āsiñcitabbāni honti
answer: ... are to be sprinkled with water
incorrect1: ... are to be kept in the box

question: ... pariyesitabbaṃ hoti
incorrect3: ... is to be kept in the box

question: uyyāne ropitā rukkhā
answer: the trees planted in the park
incorrect1: the island which should be protected
incorrect3: the lay devotees going to the park

question: ... chinditabbā na honti
incorrect1: ... are to be protected by the king
incorrect2: ... are not to be left on the bed

question: Uyyāne ropitā rukkhā chinditabbā honti.
answer: The trees planted in the park are to be cut.
incorrect1: The ministers do not govern well.
incorrect2: The gold should be kept in the box.
incorrect3: The trees planted on the island are to be cut.

question: Āpaṇesu ṭhapitāni vikkiṇitabbāni ----- kiṇituṃ te na icchiṃsu.
Ammā khādanīyāni ca bhojanīyāni ca paṭiyādetvā ----- deti.
Manussehi dānāni dātabbāni, sīlāni rakkhitabbāni, ----- kātabbāni.
Darikāya dātuṃ phalāni āpaṇasmā vā (or) khettamhā vā āharitabbāni -----.
Tumhe bhūpālā amaccehi ca ----- ca samaṇehi ca anusāsitabbā hotha.
Bhūpālassa ----- vasantā migā ca sakunā ca luddakehi na hantabbā honti.
Kusalaṃ ajānitvā pāpaṃ karontā kumārā na -----, te samaṇehi ca paṇḍehi ca sappurisehi ca anusāsitabbā.
Asappurisā -----, mā tumhe tehi saddhiṃ (with them) gāme āhiṇḍatha.
Surā na pātabbā, sace piveyyātha tumhe gilānā -----.
Sappurisā ----- pūjenti, asappurisā tathā (likewise) na karonti.
Bhūpālena rakkhitabbaṃ dīpaṃ ----- na sammā (well) pālenti.
